configuration.packets

Class PacketAskAuthentication

  • java.lang.Object
    • configuration.packets.ConfigurationPacketSender
      • configuration.packets.PacketAskAuthentication

  • public class PacketAskAuthentication
extends ConfigurationPacketSender
    A class for constructing and sending a packet for asking client for authentication
    Author:
    Romain Mormont

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PacketAskAuthentication(java.io.OutputStream os, java.lang.String message)
      Construct a packet for asking client for authentication.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PacketAskAuthentication

        public PacketAskAuthentication(java.io.OutputStream os,
                       java.lang.String message)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Construct a packet for asking client for authentication. If message is an empty string or null, no message is attached to the packet
        Parameters:
        os - an output stream (from the Socket)
        message - the message to display on the client before asking for authentication
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
